import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../styles/order.css' export default function Order() { const [recieve, setRecieve] = useState(true); const [send, setSend] = useState(false); const handleRecieve=()=>{ setSend(true) setRecieve(false) } const handleSend=()=>{ setSend(false) setRecieve(false) } return (
